parameter.name: continueNumbersAcrossStories
parameter.shortdesc: If true, numbering will continue across stories. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: continueNumbersAcrossDocuments
parameter.shortdesc: If true, numbering will continue across book documents. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new NumberingList &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the NumberingList.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the NumberingList with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the NumberingList with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the NumberingList with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the NumberingLists within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The NumberingList, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: NumberingList, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The NumberingList, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: NumberingList, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first NumberingList in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last NumberingList in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle NumberingList in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the NumberingList with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the NumberingList that follows the desired NumberingList.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the NumberingList whose index follows the specified NumberingList in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The NumberingList whose index comes before the desired NumberingList.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any NumberingList in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every NumberingList in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the NumberingList.
Returns the NumberingList with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
